title: Super Tank Create attempt: Komon
body:
This champion is a suggested champion by GCSBBlitzForever, it is merely an attempt to create it.
HP 587+94 6.2/5sec +0.93
Absorbed energy 100+levelx50
 AD 42+2.33
Atk speed 0.666+0.99%
Armour 33+2.8
MR 38+1.6
Speed 330

Passive: Release energy/ Containment
Release energy: Damage taken is put into the secondary bar of absorbed energy which does not decay. Once filled, the energy is released to nearby units over 10sec while gaining 10+levelx5 armor and MR that decays over 10sec. 
Containment: Taking damage that fills the pool in less than 1sec, a barrier is created that blocks 200+levelx100damage for 10sec. (has 10sec cd after wearing off)
Q: Valor charge. 13/12.5/12/11.5/11sec Distance of up to 675.
Dashes to the area knocking enemies on the way airbourne dealing 70%AD +20/45/70/95/120 damage as well as gaining 15/25/35/45/55 Armor and MR while charging and 2.5sec after.
Upon falling to the ground they are taunted to attack Komon for 1.25 sec.  
W: Thorn filled armour. 35/33.75/32.5/31.25/30sec
Passive: Gaining a organic armor that deals 10/15/20/25/30 +10% Armor and MR TD to attackers.
Active: Forcing Growth of the thorns, the reflected Base TD is doubled as well as gaining 20/40/60/80/100 Armor and MR for 2/2.5/3/3.5/4 sec.
E: Physical/Magical resistance 1.75sec
Switch between to gain bonus armor or MR by converting Max hp.
Gain 10 base armor and Losing 3/4/5/6/7% max hp as bonus Armor
                                                    OR
Gain 10 Base MR and losing 2/2.5/3/3.5/4% max hp as bonus MR
R: Avatar 180/145/110 sec gains 50% size.
Gains 400/600/800 hp, 30/40/50 armor, regenerating 4/5/6% max hp per second and 20/25/30 AD for 12.5/15/17.5 sec
As well as a shield that blocks 10/15/20% incoming damage for the first half of the duration.
I did not add the converting of cc and other effects into slows because that would be totally broken.
The health swapping is also stuffed up as you can go like, when you are being chased by a fed yi and you have like 50 hp then switch health to one shot them. That is stuffed up.

replies.body:
How much is in the resource bar, 10? 100? 1000? 10000? Passive: Containment shouldn't the damage be blocked better to be 200 + lvl x 70 or 80 or 90 just not 100 pls, because at lvl 18 2000 damage is still a lot, potentially creating an extremely strong late game champion, too strong. Please lower the Q MR and Armour stats pls, btw nice name for the w xD. Still pretty broken on my thoughts but i think with a little more change it could be made a champion.
Cheers, have a great day!
SilentXKiller

it says 100+levelx50
No, 2000 damage is not alot at all. lots of champions can dish out that much damage in less than 1.75 sec, i have done it before.
As fore the armour and MR, it is not that broken at all considering the minute damage he deals.
